Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 832 Circuses, Carnivals and Shows

832.01License required; applications; issuance; time limitations. 832.02Deposit required. 832.03License fees. 832.04Waiver of license fee. 832.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Power to regulate - see Ohio R. C. 715.48, 715.63

Contests or games at county fairs - see Ohio R. C. 1711.09, 1711.11

County license for public shows - see Ohio R. C. Ch. 3765

Bingo - see GEN. OFF. 630.06

Licensing in general - see B.R. & T. Ch. 820
